desc: Tape Diapers | Tape diapers are suitable for New Born babies and babies who are less than six months of age since they are not very active at the stage. Pant Diapers | When a baby is nearing six months, they start rolling and crawling and do not stay still. During this stage, Pant Diapers are more appropriate.

layout.text: Tape diapers are the best choice for people who suffer from mobility issues and are often bedridden.
